title: ReadConsoleA & ReadFile & 'type con' fails to read non-ASCII chars when code page is 65001
body:
Note: ReadConsoleW works because it is 'code page-independent'. WSL works because of some internal workarounds.
Re-inventing the wheel which is an iterator translating UTF-16 to UTF-8 each individual project is rather boring.
This annoyes me a lot since I was interested in using UTF-8 in Windows console.
